rules_text:
Creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
Non-Mutant, nondistinguished creatures you control get -1/-1. [i](Legendary creatures and creatures with power, toughness, or mana value 5 or greater are distinguished.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“All study requires material — and what better material for studying life than life?” [/i]
